attributes.action: No more homework, it overworks people for nothing.
attributes.additional_details: maybe instead of homework, you could try having teachers that actually make you intrigued in lessons.
attributes.background: as a school student, i can proudly say prep is an overused method of torture. Overworking and stress is a crappy way of helping us learn, no homework may sound like a bad idea to you, but if you think about it, the difference it would make in fitness levels and happiness would be astonishing.
